Articles.Content: I recently got Kerbal Space Program for the PS4 , and have reached my weight limit. I looked up how to increase the limit, and it said to upgrade my launch pad. But, after some time I never found out how to upgrade any facility. Please help. Thx

1 hour ago, DaOnion said:

I recently got Kerbal Space Program for the PS4 , and have reached my weight limit. I looked up how to increase the limit, and it said to upgrade my launch pad. But, after some time I never found out how to upgrade any facility. Please help. Thx

To upgrade a facility, you need to click on that building and press 'Upgrade'. This can be done by pressing the button to bring up the information for that building (I'm on Xbox so I don't know what button it is for PS4). Make sure you have enough funds too, otherwise you won't be able to upgrade it

Press the squarebutton when focused on that building or the cursor hovers over the building you want to upgrade
